messages.subject: our roadtrip to Minnesota
messages.msgSnippet: Duncan and I are leaving tomorrow (Wednesday) to visit our friends, the Traaseths, in Minnesota for a week. We were planning to drive straight through to
messages.messageBody:
Duncan and I are leaving tomorrow (Wednesday) to visit our friends, the
Traaseths, in Minnesota for a week.

We were planning to drive straight through to Chicago and stay with
Cameron's godparents (and our old Air Force buddies) in Evergreen Park,
IL. But at the last minute, that has fallen through: they are going to
have to be out of town this weekend.

So...Duncan and I are looking for somewhere to crash and visit a bit
before we head to the Minneapolis airport on Saturday to pick Ben up.
Dunc's voiced interest in staying at a B&B (He loves 'em!) or hotel
(gotta love room service! <G>, so all's not lost if we don't find a
friendly place to crash. But it would be more fun to find unschoolers
to hang with! <G> Wherever we land, we'd like to see some sights while
we're there.

If you have some space and time for us this Wednesday, Thursday, and/or
Friday as we journey north, please contact me off-list.

Our route is I-40 to I-75 to I-64 to I-71 to I-65 to I-90. Of coure,
the further along we get, the more time we have to play. The Chicago
area would be ideal (a long day's drive, but doable)---plus there's so
much to do and see!

Thanks!

~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://www.LiveandLearnConference.org
